name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald M. RIVIERA, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald M. RIVIERA, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Eugene R. Campbell, Smith & McCleary, York, for appellant.
Donald L. Reihart, Dist. Atty., Sheryl Ann Dorney, York, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
374 A.2d 534
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald M. RIVIERA, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 24, 1977.
Decided June 22, 1977.
Eugene R. Campbell, Smith & McCleary, York, for appellant.
Donald L. Reihart, Dist. Atty., Sheryl Ann Dorney, York, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
